message:
WeepingCAN Bus-Off Attack Simulator
  Stealth variant — attacker stays Error-Active throughout

Log file  : logs/weepingcan_20260219_234026.log
  JSON log  : logs/weepingcan_20260219_234026.jsonl
[ATTACKER] Pattern analysis complete → target CAN-ID=0x100  period≈10ms
[VICTIM] Preparing periodic frame  CAN-ID=0x100  seq=0x01  data=['0xde', '0xad', '0xbe', '0x1']
[ATTACKER] Building attack frame  CAN-ID=0x100  recessive-inject-at bit 35
Arbitration: SAME ID → both transmit together (WeepingCAN)
[BUS] ATTACKER injects RECESSIVE bit at position 35
[BUS] BIT ERROR detected by attacker (sent=1, read=0)
[BUS] Attacker (ATTACKER) sends 5 valid healing frame(s): TEC 8 → 3
